channel.title: Sergei Lemeshev on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Sergei Lemeshev on Rusland 1

item.title: Alone on the Road (Выхожу один я на дорогу)
item.description: Poem and Text The text of Выхожу один я на дорогу can be found on retroportal.ru . You can also find the text with translations on Lyricstranslate – including Dutch translations , in four versions. For an analysis of the poem, watch the video below.
